table_formatting.bullets: Format the parameters and their descriptions as a table.The table will be in the form of a bulleted list. The description for each param will be an indented bullet on a new line.
table_formatting.pipes: Format the parameters only as a markdown table using the following instructions: To add a table, use three or more hyphens (---) to create each column header, and use pipes (|) to separate each column. For compatibility, you should also add a pipe on either end of the row.

code_formatting.md_code_format: Surround single line python code with single backticks, and multiple lines of code with: ```python SAMPLE_CODE ```

general.md_format_instruct: Respond using markdown style formatting. Use the # character for headers, with at least one space in between the header and the next text.
